Name: Hentai PuZZles
About the game: Always dreamed of collecting puzzle pictures of anime girls? Now you have such an opportunity! In this game you can collect puzzles-pictures of different anime girls with different backgrounds. Who does not like anime girls? I think everyone loves anime Features: -Game genre: puzzles -Theme: anime -Different rods for every taste and choice (with clothes, without clothes, with white hair, with blue hair and so on) -Various backgrounds (each girl has her own background) -Also the game will help you develop both spiritually and physically -15 different puzzles -Simple and fun gameplay (just choose pictures and drag puzzles to collect the picture) -Powerful engine Unreal Engine -Good soundtrack
